title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. II, subch. D, pt. 4815 - Bingo Supplier: Application And Licensing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. II, subch. D, pt. 4815 - Bingo Supplier: Application And Licensing

State Regulations
§ 4815.1 - License required
§ 4815.2 - Form for application
§ 4815.3 - Individual and business entity statement
§ 4815.4 - Corporation statement
§ 4815.5 - List of employees, agents or representatives
§ 4815.6 - Requisites for license
§ 4815.7 - Hearings
§ 4815.8 - Issuance by commission
§ 4815.9 - Disapproval procedure
§ 4815.10 - Grounds for revocation or suspension
§ 4815.11 - Persons prohibited from participating in the conduct of bingo
§ 4815.12 - Bingo supplier to notify commission of all changes in structure
§ 4815.13 - Maintenance of books and records
§ 4815.14 - Sales to other than licensed organizations prohibited
§ 4815.15 - Transaction of business during conduct of bingo prohibited
§ 4815.16 - Time during which license is effective
§ 4815.17 - Temporary permit
§ 4815.18 - License form
§ 4815.19 - Recapitulation of fees
§ 4815.20 - Identity on bingo cards
§ 4815.21 - Supplier's gifts, donations and loans prohibited

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. II, subch. D, pt. 4815

Statutory authority: General Municipal Law, art. 9-A, §§ 186, 188-a, 495-a; Executive Law, art. 19-B, §435, as amd. by
L. 1962, ch. 437; Racing, Pari- Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law, §§
104[1], [19], 128

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
